alert.note: Alert for Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 17 at 9:24AM EST until December 17 at 4:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Schuylkill County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog will be limited to elevations at or above 1600 feet above sea level, which is the elevation where Interstate 81 runs through much of Schuylkill County between Pine Grove and McAdoo. Visibility could be just a few hundred feet in some locations.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of braking distance between you and the vehicles ahead. For dense fog safety information, visit weather.gov/fog. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
